HeroSection.description: I'm a Full Stack developer with a strong focus on web and mobile frontend, and experience in backend development. I'm currently studying Systems Analysis and Development at IFPB - Campus Esperança and continuously strive to improve my skills through various projects.

AboutSection.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a Full Stack developer with experience building complete solutions — from modern, accessible interfaces to robust backend integrations.
On the frontend, I use React and Next.js to develop responsive, high-performance applications with great user experience. I also work with Flutter to build native and cross-platform mobile apps.
On the backend, I work with TypeScript (Node.js) and Go, creating scalable, secure, and high-performance APIs with a focus on best practices, testing, and maintainability.
I'm committed to technical quality and continuously improving, aiming to deliver well-structured, efficient, and sustainable solutions — whether in personal or professional projects.

typescript.short: JavaScript superset that adds static typing.
typescript.full: TypeScript is a language based on JavaScript that adds optional static typing. This improves code readability, simplifies maintenance, and reduces development-time errors, making it widely used in medium to large-scale applications.

dart.short: Modern language by Google, mainly used with Flutter.
dart.full: Dart is a programming language optimized for building modern, reactive interfaces. Developed by Google, it is strongly typed, object-oriented, and widely used with Flutter for building cross-platform applications.

golang.short: Efficient, compiled language ideal for scalable backends.
golang.full: Go, also known as Golang, is a compiled language created by Google focused on simplicity, performance, and concurrency. It is widely used in APIs, servers, and distributed systems due to its lightness and robustness.

tailwindcss.short: Utility-first CSS framework for modern responsive UIs.
tailwindcss.full: TailwindCSS is a utility-first framework that provides predefined classes for styling directly in HTML. It speeds up development, keeps visual consistency, and reduces custom CSS.

nextjs.short: React framework with hybrid rendering, great for SEO and performance.
nextjs.full: Next.js is a React framework supporting server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), and built-in APIs. It’s ideal for modern applications focused on performance, SEO, and great developer experience.

shadcnui.short: Accessible components styled with Radix and TailwindCSS.
shadcnui.full: shadcn/ui is a component library built with Radix UI and styled using TailwindCSS. It combines accessibility, customization, and best practices for building modern React interfaces with strong usability.

flutter.short: Google's framework for cross-platform apps with one codebase.
flutter.full: Flutter is a UI toolkit by Google for building native apps for Android, iOS, Web, and Desktop from a single codebase using Dart. It offers a rich widget collection, high performance, and modern UI capabilities.

fastify.short: Lightweight and fast Node.js web framework focused on performance.
fastify.full: Fastify is a web framework for Node.js designed for high performance with low overhead. It's extensible via plugins and great for building fast, scalable APIs.

nestjs.short: Backend framework for Node.js with modular TypeScript architecture.
nestjs.full: NestJS is a modern backend framework built with TypeScript and inspired by Angular. It promotes modular architecture, eases testing, and supports both Express and Fastify under the hood.

sqlite.short: Lightweight, embedded relational database ideal for local apps.
sqlite.full: SQLite is a lightweight, embedded, self-contained, serverless SQL database engine. It's widely used in mobile apps, desktop tools, and embedded systems for its simplicity and efficiency.

postgresql.short: Robust, open-source, and highly scalable relational database.
postgresql.full: PostgreSQL is an open-source relational database known for its robustness, standards compliance, and extensibility. It supports JSON, replication, advanced indexing, and more.

prisma.short: Modern ORM for Node.js and TypeScript focused on performance and DX.
prisma.full: Prisma is a next-gen ORM that makes database access easy with a type-safe API for TypeScript. It improves developer productivity, ensures data consistency, and supports databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite.

firebase.short: Google platform offering services like auth, real-time DB, and more.
firebase.full: Firebase is a platform by Google offering services like authentication, real-time database, Firestore, analytics, push notifications, storage, and hosting to speed up app development.

nodejs.short: JavaScript runtime for backend development, based on V8.
nodejs.full: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine for running code server-side. It's widely used for building APIs, servers, and real-time applications with high performance.
